text.12_Siman, 1_Seif Katan: The Taz writes that there is also no issue of forbidding eating the limb of a live animal. Also there is no issue of slaughtering it and it's mother [on the same day] and it is permissible to slaughter it on the same day as its mother and father.
text.114_Siman, 0_Seif Katan: The Tur writes that there is no difference whether they are milking for themselves or for the benefit of a Jew (and this is the consensus of the poskim).

work: Ba'er Hetev on Shulchan Arukh, Yoreh De'ah
